abstract: The Apple iPhone is acceptable for business use, says Gartner. But companies should still be concerned about some security and usability issues.
snippet: The Apple iPhone is acceptable for business use, says Gartner. But companies should still be concerned about some security and usability issues.
lead_paragraph: (UPDATED 6:45 p.m.| Gartner suggested in its report that there was some unspecified, difficult way to do cut-and-paste on the iPhone, but as several commenters pointed out, cut-and-paste as most people know it is nonexistent.)

headline.main: Is Apple iPhone Ready for Business? Sort of, Says Gartner
